meanings.definition: A group of seven days; a week.
meanings.sent1: Every hebdomad, we look forward to the weekend.
meanings.sent2: Let's plan our activities for the upcoming hebdomad.
meanings.sent3: The hebdomad seemed to fly by with all the fun we had.
meanings.sent4: The hebdomad stretched out before us like a long road to travel.
meanings.sent5: In the hebdomad, each day brings something new and exciting.

meanings.definition: The seventh day of the week; Saturday.
meanings.sent1: On the hebdomad, we usually relax and enjoy our time off.
meanings.sent2: Many people look forward to the hebdomad for rest and relaxation.
meanings.sent3: We decided to have a picnic in the park on the hebdomad.
meanings.sent4: The hebdomad is like a mini-vacation at the end of a busy week.
meanings.sent5: Saturday, the hebdomad, is a day to unwind and recharge.

meanings.sent1: The completion of a hebdomad marks a significant milestone.
meanings.sent2: During this hebdomad, we will see many changes and growth.
meanings.sent3: It felt like a hebdomad had passed before we reached our goal.
meanings.sent4: The hebdomad of youth is a time of exploration and discovery.
meanings.sent5: In the vast hebdomad of life, each year holds its own lessons.
